quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Lygend Resources & Technology Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Lygend Resources & Technology Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Lygend Resources & Technology Co Ltd is a China-based company principally engaged in the whole nickel industry chain business. The Company operates primarily through three segments. The Nickel Products Trading segment is principally engaged in the purchase and sales of laterite nickel ore, ferronickel and nickel-cobalt compounds. The Nickel Products Production segment is principally engaged in the production of ferronickel products and nickel-cobalt compounds. The Equipment Manufacturing and Sales segment is principally engaged in the manufacturing and sales of nickel production equipment. The Company's products are mainly used in the fields of steel and new energy vehicles. The Company principally conducts its businesses in the domestic market.
